mapper.select: SELECT t.f_id, t.f_code, t.f_name, t.f_abb, t.f_url, t.f_path, t.f_type, t.f_icon, t.f_order, t.f_parent, t.f_visible, (CASE WHEN (t.f_parent = '#' OR t.f_parent = '0') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as f_root, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t1.opt_perms) FROM sys_authz_feature_opts t1 WHERE t1.f_id = t.f_id) f_perms FROM sys_authz_feature_list t WHERE t.f_id = #{id}
